title: Care dont be fouled by scam link
body:
**[Link Removed]**

enjoywe are now at season 6 soo riot give free3900 RP WARD skin just login and chose one enjoy

^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
This link was sent to me and i clicked on it. it asked me to log into my league acc so i logged into and nothing happened afterthat. Soon after i was logged out of my league cilent and knowing about scam link i quickly changed my password. When i logged back onto my league cilent the link was sent to everyone that was online. BE CAREFUL

replies.body: Everyone knows about league0flegends by now. People who try to get free RP are just dumb and need to be taught a lesson. This has done this.

Hi summoner, 

**Please don't post any links here**, as other players might click on the links (even if they obvious scams)

>Be sure to send in a support ticket to Riot with the name of the bot and their message so the account can be banned (pref send screenshots).

>Please keep in mind that player support is busy and it may take a lil while for them to get back to you (almost always reply within a week). During this time do not lodge multiple tickets or continue adding information to your existing ticket, as it may send your enquiry to the back of the queue.

>Due to privacy reasons Riot can't respond to your ticket with details about if a punishment was handed out or not.

If you do encounter a scam and your account becomes compromised, please go through and change all your passwords and verify your email [HERE](https://account.leagueoflegends.com/oce/en/protect).

You can read more about keeping your account safe [HERE](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account)

There is even a fun little infographic about account safety [HERE](http://eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/account-security-education/?utm_source=eune_en&utm_medium=fpcard&utm_campaign=ase). 

Stay safe ♥

Bad luck m8!
Hope your shit gets fixed!

as long as he didnt use my rp
{{item:3070}}
It's a bot, it doesn't use your RP. It tries to infect everyone on your friends list like a virus. Or more accurately AIDS.
Yeah Malz kinda broke containment again didn't he rito?
